WJBISQ-1.name: ALEX RIVERS

experience.title: Winner, SUSTHack Hackathon
experience.description: A cross-institutional event by Sunway University & Singapore Polytechnic

experience.title: Winner, EY Business Case Competition
experience.description: Led a winning team in solving real-world business challenges

experience.title: Community Service
experience.description: Active in community service projects including food banks and national religious organizations

experience.title: Committee Member, Sunway Photography Club
experience.description: Organized campus-wide photo walks and exhibitions

experience.title: Resume Parsing App
experience.description: Uses Generative AI to enhance ATS efficiency and streamline hiring pipelines (Personal Project)

experience.title: Home Lab with Honeypot
experience.description: Built to analyze attacker behavior and implement intrusion detection (Personal Project)

experience.title: Inventory Management System
experience.description: Designed and deployed for small retail operations using web technologies (Personal Project)

WJBISQ-1.quick summary: Alex Rivers is a cybersecurity enthusiast with a strong academic background (3.92 CGPA) and proven experience in hackathons and business competitions.  He possesses a range of technical skills including programming languages (Python, Java), networking tools (Cisco Packet Tracer), and cybersecurity platforms (TryHackMe).  His personal projects demonstrate initiative and practical application of skills.
WJBISQ-1.Rejection or Acceptance Letter:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for your interest in the Cybersecurity Professional position at [Company Name]. We were impressed by your academic achievements, technical skills, and demonstrated passion for cybersecurity. Your personal projects, particularly the resume parsing app and honeypot setup, showcase your initiative and practical skills.  While your experience is primarily academic and project-based, we believe your potential is significant. We would like to invite you for an interview to discuss your qualifications further.

Sincerely,
[Hiring Manager Name]

WJBISQ-2.name: Ng Shannon

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (Computer Networking and Security)

experience.title: IT Intern
experience.description: Helped set up company website, provided input on layout and content, basic troubleshooting, designed and built custom chatbot workflows in Respond.io, handled troubleshooting and communication with Respond.io support.

experience.title: Sales Assistant
experience.description: Gained product knowledge in electronic gadgets, practiced customer service, built strong teamwork.

experience.title: Teacher Assistant
experience.description: Developed problem-solving and communication skills, assisted with student supervision.

WJBISQ-2.quick summary: A year 2 student pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (Computer Networking and Security) with a 3.58 GPA.  Has experience in IT operations, digital automation (building chatbots), website development (HTML, CSS), and customer service.  Seeks a web or front-end role to gain more experience.
WJBISQ-2.Rejection or Acceptance Letter:
Dear Ng Shannon,

Thank you for your interest in the cybersecurity professional position at [Company Name]. We appreciate you taking the time to submit your application.

While your academic record and some of your experiences are impressive, your current skill set and experience don't fully align with the requirements of this specific role.  We are looking for candidates with more direct experience in cybersecurity.  We wish you the best in your job search and encourage you to reapply when your experience more closely matches our requirements.

Sincerely,
The [Company Name] Hiring Team

WJBISQ-4.name: Maria Chen
education: BEng in Software Engineering - GHI Tech
experience: Implemented a REST API for an e-commerce platform.
WJBISQ-4.quick summary: Maria Chen is a prospective Information Security Engineer with a BEng in Software Engineering from GHI Tech.  Her skills include penetration testing, SIEM, Wireshark, and Nmap. She has experience implementing a REST API for an e-commerce platform.
WJBISQ-4.Rejection or Acceptance Letter:
Dear Maria,

Thank you for your interest in the Information Security Engineer position at [Company Name]. While your background in software engineering and familiarity with security tools like Wireshark and Nmap are promising, your resume lacks detailed information on your experience in cybersecurity roles. To strengthen your application, we encourage you to highlight relevant projects or work experience that demonstrate your practical skills in penetration testing and SIEM implementation. We wish you the best in your job search.

Sincerely,
[Hiring Manager Name]

XMVKQQ-1.name: Lucas Smith
XMVKQQ-1.quick summary: Lucas Smith is a candidate with an MSc in Data Science from DEF University.  His skills include penetration testing, using tools like Metasploit and Wireshark, and experience with firewalls. He has a project demonstrating intrusion detection system development using Python.
XMVKQQ-1.Rejection or Acceptance Letter:
Dear Lucas,

Thank you for your interest in the Cybersecurity Engineer position at [Company Name]. We appreciate you taking the time to submit your application.

While your academic background and demonstrated skills in Python and security tools are promising, we require candidates with more extensive professional experience in cybersecurity for this role.  We wish you the best in your job search.

Sincerely,
[Hiring Manager Name]
[Company Name]

WJBISQ-5.name: MUHAMMAD AZIM FAIZAL

education.project: Cloud-Based Helpdesk Ticketing System Using Python & Flask

experience.title: IT Support Executive
experience.description: Provided Tier 1 and Tier 2 support to over 200 employees across 3 branch offices. Installed, configured, and maintained hardware, software, and printers. Managed user accounts and group policies through Active Directory. Assisted in migrating company email system to Microsoft 365 with zero downtime. Documented IT processes and created internal knowledge base articles.

experience.title: System Administrator Intern
experience.description: Monitored server uptime and assisted in daily backups and patch management. Supported the setup of virtual machines using VMware and Hyper-V. Helped resolve networking issues and upgraded antivirus systems across campus labs.

WJBISQ-5.quick summary: A dedicated IT Specialist with 3+ years of experience in technical support, system administration, and software deployment.  Proficient in various operating systems, networking protocols, and programming languages. Holds a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology with a strong CGPA and relevant certifications (CompTIA A+, ITIL Foundation).  Experience includes managing user accounts, migrating email systems, and working with cloud technologies.
WJBISQ-5.Rejection or Acceptance Letter:
Dear Muhammad Azim Faizal,

Thank you for your interest in the position at [Company Name] and taking the time to submit your application. We were impressed with your technical skills, experience, and academic achievements. Your experience at FusionTech Sdn Bhd, particularly your contributions to the Microsoft 365 migration, is noteworthy.  We would like to invite you for an interview to discuss your qualifications further.

Please let us know your availability for a brief introductory call.

Sincerely,
The [Company Name] Hiring Team
